title: Petition to make the River Red when Vladimir is in game

replies.body: Only if Vlad makes it red by pooling in the river.
Make it so every time he pools in the river it gets just a little bit more red

I keep trying to make this into a political cartoon because the Vlad's name is _Government_.

Maybe something about how they think they're untouchable but refuse to deal with real-world issues.
Only once Vlad gets his first kill

> [{quoted}](name=Cant Hold Me Now,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=MIQyRXbr,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2017-08-01T22:43:23.410+0000)
>
> Only once Vlad gets his first kill

But it has to be IN the river.
Why stop at the river? Make the whole Rift red.

Rip china

whole rift is black

No, he means the actor, River Phoenix. He was also talking to Annie, who he thought was Little Red Riding Hood. Thus, his statement is actually thus:
"The River will run, Red!"
_Quick thing: does Annie have a little red skin? It would fit her perfectly._
I'm thinking it should be something a little more subtle, but I love this idea
